20611.「全国３０００万のコロシアムファンの皆さま\n たいへん 長らく お待たせしまし:
To our 30 million Coliseum fans worldwide,
we thank you for your continued patience!

20612.「ついに ついに 夢のビッグイベント\n 第１回バトリンピック決勝バトルの\n:
Finally, at long lastーthe curtain raises on
this once in a lifetime event: the final
battle of the First Battlympics!

20613.「バトリンピックは ラッカラン島オーナー\n ゴーレック氏を 大会名誉顧問として:
This official tournament is being hosted by
none other than the owner of Luckland:
Mr. Golek! He will serve as honorary advisor!

20614.「さあ 記念すべき この決勝バトルの\n 第１試合で 戦うのは\n 予選第４位の:
And now, for our first match of this
unforgettable series of battles, we have our
fourth place qualifier, <pc>...

20615.「対するは 予選第３位の バルケス選手です。\n ご観戦の皆さま 両選手に 盛大:
Going up against <if_woman>her<else>him<endif> is our third place
qualifier, Valucas! Ladies and gentlemen!
Let's hear it for both of our contestants!

20616.<if_woman>「よお ジェイコフの弟子のねーちゃん。\n オレのこと 覚え:
Hey there. Remember me? We met when you
were playing debt collector.

20617.「まさか ジェイコフの腰ぬけの弟子が\n 決勝バトルまで 残るなんてなぁ……。\:
Never thought Jakov's pathetic little protege
would make it this far...
But lucky me, huh?

20618.「さっそく バトル開始と まいりましょう！\n 両選手とも 神妙に 見合って……:
Our fighters have already taken position!
Let's get this battle started, shall we?!

20620.「全国３０００万のコロシアムファンの皆さま\n たいへん 長らく お待たせしまし:
To our 30 million Coliseum fans worldwide,
we thank you for your continued patience!

20621.「今回 戦うのは 奇しくも初戦と同じ\n この組み合わせ。\n 予選第４位の <:
This time, we have the same pairing as our
first match. Our fourth-place qualifier
<pc>, and...

20622.「予選第３位の バルケス選手です。\n ご観戦の皆さま 両選手に 盛大な拍手を！:
Here's Valucas, our third-place qualifier.
Let's hear it for both of our fighters!

20623.「また お前と戦うのかよ？\n ……ったく うぜえ ルールだぜ！:
We're fighting each other again?
Damn those rules...

20624.「さっそく バトル開始と まいりましょう！\n 両選手とも 神妙に 見合って……:
Our fighters have already taken position!
Let's get this battle started, shall we?!

20627.「さあ 予選４位が ３位をくだして\n 勝ち上がったのは <pc>選手！\n は:
Fourth place against third, and <pc>
comes out on top! But will <if_woman>she<else>he<endif> be able
to do the same to their next opponent?!

20628.「対するは 予選第２位の ブリギッテ選手。\n その優美な たたずまいからは 想:
Coming next is Brigette, our second place finisher in the qualifiers! Under those graceful looks is some serious skill in the
Coliseum!

20629.「ご観戦の皆さま 両選手に 盛大な拍手を！:
Let's give a big round of applause for both
fighters!

20630.「あんた なかなか やるみたいね！\n でも コロシアム界隈じゃ ２番だわ。:
You're not half bad! But here in the Coliseum,
you're number two.

20631.「……１番は 誰なのかって？\n バカね。そんなの このブリギッテ様に\n 決ま:
...Who's number one, you ask? Of course it's
obviously ME, you dolt!

20632.「さっそく バトル開始と まいりましょう！\n 両選手とも 神妙に 見合って……:
Our fighters have already taken position!
Let's get this battle started, shall we?!

20636.「決勝が始まる前 誰が 予想できたでしょう？\n この無名の若者が これほどまで:
Who would've thought this no-name fighter
be so incredibly strong?!

20637.「優勝に王手をかけた <pc>選手。\n 次も勝って 栄光を手にできるのか？\n:
<pc> is one step closer to tasting
victory. Will they win and claim glory? Or
will they fail and start from scratch?

20638.「立ちはだかるは コロシアムファンなら\n 誰もが知る 実力派バトルマスター。\:
Standing in their way is a battlemaster you
should all know well. It's Sainz, our first
place qualifier!

20639.「ご観戦の皆さま 両選手に 盛大な拍手を！: Let's hear it for both of our fighters!

20640.「まさか お前さんが ここまでやるとはな……\n はじめて会ったときは 想像もし:
When I first met you, I never expected you to
make it this far. I'm happy to see how much
you've grown as your senior.

20641.「だが オレは オレこそが\n 最強のバトルマスターであることを\n 証明しなく:
But I have to prove that I'M the strongest
battlemaster out there.

20642.「……特に ジェイコフの弟子である\n お前さんには 絶対 負けられないな。\n:
I won't lose to anyone, especially not a pupil
of Jakov! No hard feelings!

20643.「それでは この運命の一戦\n バトル開始と まいりましょう！\n 両選手とも:
The battle of destiny is about to begin!
Both fighters are raring to go!

20646.「第１回バトリンピック 優勝者……\n その名は <pc>だぁっ！！:
And the winner of the First Battlympics is...
<pc>!!!!!!

20647.「……それでは 大会名誉顧問ゴーレック氏より\n チャンピオン <pc>選手に\:
And now, our honorary advisor Mr. Golek will
present our champion with their prize, and
a special bouquet!

20648.「すばらしい バトルでありましたな。\n 自分は 心から感動したでありますよ！:
What an amazing battle. I was on the edge of
my seat the entire time!

20649.「た た 大変だぁぁぁっ！！\n リングに魔物が 入り込んでいるぞぉぉ！:
W-w-what is THIS?! Monsters have entered
the ring!!

20650.「<pc>っ！\n ゴーレックは オレが守る！\n お前は デンタザウルスを倒す:
<pc>! Leave Golek to me!
You take care of the monsters!

20651.「……えー 運営側の報告によりますと\n 競技用に捕らえていた魔物が 搬送の途中:
A...according to our management, it seems that
the monsters captured for the competition
accidentally managed to escape!

20653.「この花束……これは 月光の花といって\n その香りは 今 倒した デンタザウル:
The flowers in this bouquet...they're called
Moonlight Flowers. Their scent attracts those
Tortoceratops we just had to defeat.

20654.「そして この花束を用意したのも\n コロシアムで使う魔物を管理してるのも\n:
And the one who prepared this bouquet is the
same person who manages the monsters used
here... That can't be just a coincidence.

20655.「そう。このバトリンピックを企画した張本人。\n コロシアムの裏メニューを取り仕:
That's right. The mastermind behind the
Battlympics... Vice director in charge of the
Coliseum's secret menu. It's YOU, Brandon!

20656.「あなたは オーナーの地位を狙って\n ゴーレック氏を 事故に見せかけて暗殺すべ:
You planned the Battlympics this way, hoping
to assassinate Golek for position, and framing
it to look like an accident, didn't you?!

20659.「計画は ついえたが……\n うちのボスを 捕らえさせるわけには\n いかねぇな:
Our plan fell through, but...
I can't let you have him.

20660.「……セインズ。\n やはり ブランドンに ついていたか。:
Sainz... I knew it. You were in league with
Brandon all along.

20661.「アンタさえ 現れなきゃ\n すべて うまくいったものを……な。:
And everything would've gone as planned had
you not decided to show up...

20663.<center>騒然とした雰囲気の中 \n表彰式が 再開されることもなく\nバト:
Amidst the uproar, the award ceremony did
not resume, and the Battlympics came to a
sudden close.

20664.「いやはや 大変なことになりましたなぁ。\n まさか バトリンピックが ブランド:
What a mess this all turned out to be...
I had no idea that Brandon had planned all
this from the beginning...

20665.「ンフフフ……。とはいえ 優勝は 優勝！\n あなたが 最強のバトルマスターであ:
Hmm hmm hmm...but still. A winner's a winner!
There is no denying now that you are the best
battlemaster there is.

20666.「表彰式で 渡しそびれていた優勝賞品は\n 今 ここで お渡ししましょう。:
I will give you your prize that you didn't get
during the award ceremony.

20668.「……と思いましたが どうやら 持ち物が\n いっぱいの ご様子。あずかっておき:
...Hmm, it seems like you're carrying a bit
too much for me to give this to you. Please
come back again when you're able to.

20669.「セインズ選手や ブランドン氏の手下たちは\n 陰謀に加担していたとして\n あ:
It looks like those who were serving under
Sainz and Brandon have all been taken
into custody for their involvement.

20670.「よお <pc>。\n バトリンピック優勝 ご苦労だったな。\n おかげで いろ:
Hey there. Thanks a lot for winning the
Battlympics. I couldn't have done any of
this without your help.

20671.「まあ 聞きたいこともあるだろうが\n とりあえず 今回の修行も 達成したんだ。:
I'm sure you have tons of questions for me,
but for now, this completes your training.
Now how should I reward you this time...

20672.「……よし！ \n 今のオメーなら 使いこなせるだろう。\n バトマスの奥義を:
All right! You're skilled enough now, so I
think you'll be just fine to use it. I'm going
to teach you the secret of battlemasters!

20673.「全身のチカラを 抜いておけよっ。\n ……いくぜ 必殺技のツボっ！！:
Now, keep your body relaxed...
Get ready! Here it comes!

20674.「……え～っと それじゃ これ持ってけよ。\n まあ たいしたモンじゃねーけど。:
Um, well...here, take this.
It's not much, but whatever.

20675.「……さてと 何から話したもんかなぁ。\n まずは オレと ゴーレックの関係か。:
Now, where should I start...?
I guess I'll tell you about my relationship
with Golek.

20676.「ゴーレックとは 昔なじみの くされ縁でな。\n 昔っから 護衛とか 頼まれるこ:
He and I go way back. He'd always ask me to
be his bodyguard, and this time he had asked
me to do so again.

20677.「コロシアム副理事の ブランドンに\n 怪しい動きがあるから 調べてくれってさ。:
Brandon, the Coliseum's assistant director, had been acting suspiciously, so he wanted me to look into it. That old timer has a great
judge of character.

20678.「……で コロシアムに入りびたって\n 例のモンスター勝ち抜き戦に 出たり\n:
And so I ended up hanging around the Coliseum.
I entered that monster battle, racked up some
debts, and poked around a few things.

20679.「けど なかなか シッポがつかめなくてな。\n ようやく 何か大イベントを開いて:
But they were always just out of reach. I finally figured out that they were planning some big event and were going to make their
move there.

20680.「だが 無気力で なまけ者のオレが\n いきなり そんな大会に 出場したりしたら:
But if a lazy old man like me were to enter
the tournament, that would raise a few
eyebrows, wouldn't it?

20681.「それで 困ってたところに 現れたのが\n オメーだったわけさ。あんまり 都合よ:
I didn't know what else to do, and that's when
you showed up. It was almost too convenient
that I thought it was a set up by Brandon!

20682.「あとは オメーにも 想像つくだろ？\n 仮面を着けたオレは オメーをおとりにし:
And I'm sure you can guess the rest. I was
the one behind the mask, using you as bait
to see what they were plannin'.

20683.「うまい具合に ブランドンは 月光の花集めに\n オメーを使ったりして おかげで:
Brandon cleverly used you to gather those
Moonlight Flowers, and that's when it all
began to make sense.

20684.「しかし まさか 元弟子のセインズが\n ブランドンの手下に 成りさがってるとは:
To think that my former pupil Sainz would
become one of Brandon's lackeys, though...
I hadn't planned on that.

20685.「……これで オレに話せることは 全部だ。\n 今まで 利用してきて すまなかっ:
...And that's all. I'm sorry that I was just
using you, but truth be told, I did really
see somethin' special in you.

31960.「……はい？ 私ですか？\n 私は たまたま 受け付けをまかされていた\n 善良:
...What? And me? I'm just a faithful employee
of the Coliseum who works the reception.
Nothing more.

31961.「よく 見た目や 笑い方が 怪しいからって\n 何か企んでるんじゃ？……と疑われ:
People often suspect me of things just because
of how I look or the way I smile... Kind of
rude, don't you think? Hmm hmm hmm...

59308.「予想外の連続で いまだ 勝者は決せず。\n どうなる？ どうなってしまう！？\:
The winner has yet to be decided. What will
happen? What will happen? The 1st Battlympics
Final Battle!
